body:
Hello @thoo! Thanks for updating the PR.





































Cheers ! There are no PEP8 issues in this Pull Request. :beers: 

##### Comment last updated on February 04, 2019 at 19:19 Hours UTC
@thoo there is one test that checks the docstrings that is being affected by this change. Can you take a look and make the test pass please?
